Title: "TIFFANY & CO. 86238 SWISS MADE QUARTZ 3 ATM WATER RESISTANT" Vogue Female Watch
ConditionDescription: Keeps perfect time. We Inherited this piece in 2012. We Immediately Contacted Tiffany & Co. Archives for an appraisal. They sent us a letter (Pictured in its Entirety in Illustration No. 2) stating they "may be able to research it" for a fee of a thousand dollars which, in our view, seems to defeat the purpose. Watches are not our forte, but, from an Online Article Entitled, "How to Identify a Tiffany Watch by Maker & Serial Number" (eHow) we were able to determine that the "86238" is most likely a Metal Content Number. We know it's WATER RESISTANT." Beyond that, We have the Eye-Test: This Both Looks and Operates like an Expensive Watch.As a Bonus, we will have the battery replaced by a Certified Tiffany Jeweler  (Mann's Jewelers in Pittsford, N.Y., with the attendant receipt)  just prior to shipping. It would Provide a Meaningful Holiday Gift.

ICONIC HIGH END VINTAGE & ANTIQUECOLLECTIBLES WE ARE SMOKE & ANIMAL FREE, IF YOU DON'T COUNT THE SALT WATER AQUARIUMS AT EVERY TURN. . . ITEM: "TIFFANY & CO. 86238 SWISS MADE QUARTZ 3 ATM WATER RESISTANT" Vogue Female Watch~ Keeps Perfect Time ~We Inherited This Piece in 2012. We Immediately Contacted Tiffany & Co. Archives for an Appraisal. They Sent Us a Letter (Pictured in its Entirety in Illustration No. 2) Stating, "They may be able to research it for a fee of $1,000," which, in Our View, seems to defeat the purpose.Watches are not our forte, but, from an Online Article Entitled, "How to Identify a Tiffany Watch by Maker & Serial Number" (eHow) we were able to determine that the "86238" is most likely a Metal Content Number. Too, We know it's "WATER RESISTANT." As a bonus, we will have the battery replaced by a Certified Tiffany Jeweler (as per Mann's Jewelers in Pittsford, N.Y., with the attendant receipt) just prior to shipping. ~Needless to Say, A Tiffany Watch, would Provide a Meaningful Holiday Gift ~ In its Current State, it Offers Not Only Haute Elegance but a Significant Investment Opportunity. That is the Beauty of Quality Craftsmanship and Design: it will Look Better, Last Longer, and Only Continue to Appreciate in Value Over Time. It's an Impeccably Holistic Investment. SIZE: The Watch Face is Precisely 1" in Diameter. With the Band, to Which it is Soldered, it is 7 inches in Length. Altogether, Watch & Band are a Solid 25 Grams. ************************************************************ ~ BOTTOM LINE: IT'S ONLY A GREAT BUY IF IT GETS TO YOU ~ USING USPS FIRST CLASS, WE SHIP QUICKLY WITH GREAT CAUTION. WE DOUBLE-BUBBLE WRAP EACH ITEM & WALK IT INTO THE LOCAL POST OFFICE. WE THEN OBTAIN: (1) A RECEIPT DOCUMENTING TIME OF DELIVERY TO THE EXACT SECOND, (2) THE ID NUMBER OF THE POSTAL CLERK; & (3) THE TRACKING NUMBER. WE HAVE EACH ITEM MARKED "FRAGILE" IN RED LETTERS & RETAIN THE RECEIPT UNTIL IT IS SAFELY DELIVERED. WE ALSO SEND "POST PURCHASE UPDATES" TO OUR CUSTOMERS. USING THIS APPROACH, WE'VE NEVER HAD AN ITEM LOST OR DAMAGED IN TRANSIT. Powered by eBay Turbo Lister The free listing tool.
